title: Event Marketing & Page Design for ROBLOX World Builders Championship – West Africa Regional Finals (Lagos)
description: We’re hosting the ROBLOX World Builders Championship – West Africa Regional Finals in Lagos, and we need a freelancer to design a high-impact marketing and event page. The page should capture the energy of competitive gaming while making it simple for fans, teams, and sponsors to get information, register, and engage. The ideal partner will deliver a design that is bold, interactive, and aligned with both ROBLOX’s creative culture and esports best practices.
